title: Great Smart Bulbs for Mom - Easy Setup, No Hub Needed!
reviewText: I purchased this 8-pack of Govee Smart Light Bulbs for my mom as a Christmas gift, and the setup was incredibly easy. We simply added the bulbs to the Govee app on her phone, and then enabling the Govee skill in Alexa automatically discovered the new bulbs. The entire process took maybe ten minutes from start to finish.The integration with her Alexa speaker has been seamless. The bulbs offer normal brightness levels and a wide range of colors. Using Alexa voice commands, it's very straightforward to turn the lights on and off or change their color.While we haven't experimented with the music sync feature or the dynamic scenes, the basic color control through Alexa has been perfect for my mom's needs. We haven't experienced any issues with connectivity or reliability, except for the expected outage when the internet went down, which naturally affected Alexa's functionality.Having personally used Philips Hue bulbs for years, I was particularly impressed that these Govee bulbs don't require a separate hub, which made the setup for my mom much simpler. The value of this 8-bulb pack is outstanding – it cost roughly the same as a single Hue bulb and provides the same core functionality. Honestly, it makes my initial investment in Hue seem quite expensive in retrospect.My mom has these bulbs installed in her living room lamps and her bedroom. She typically keeps the living room lights on a bright white setting, but she enjoys changing the bedroom lights to red in the evening, as she finds it easier on her eyes. These Govee bulbs have been a fantastic and affordable way to add smart lighting to her home.

title: Excellent Quality, Intuitive App, and Brilliant Colors
reviewText: I couldn’t be happier with my Govee LED bulb interior lights. The quality of the bulbs is outstanding—they feel durable and well-made right out of the box. Setup was a breeze, and the connectivity is absolutely seamless. The Govee app is incredibly intuitive and gives you full control over your lighting, whether you want to manage each bulb individually or group them together.The colors are vibrant and bright, making a huge difference compared to standard bulbs. It's not just a visual upgrade—it's a full atmosphere transformation. One thing I also really appreciate is that the bulbs don’t get too hot, even after being on for hours.Overall, this is a fantastic upgrade to any space. Highly recommend if you’re looking for smart lighting that’s both functional and fun.

title: The Best Money Spent Upgrading my Home Environment
reviewText: I first ordered the 4 pack of these lights about a year ago and I loved them, and recently splurged to replace all of the lights in my house with Govee lights. As a very light sensitive person, I truly think this is the best money I have spent to level up my home environment. I have had other LED lights, but the apps and the controls are nowhere near what the Govee apps allow you to do!You can control the brightness and color, as well as choose from the standard range of bright to warm white lights; and there is a full library of pre programmed functions and 'scenes' such as Crackling Fire, Galaxy or Party, where thee colors change, brighten and dim, and this can be coordinated among any group of lights throughout a room or your entire house.One of my favorite features that I only recently began to fully utilize is the Automation, and Timers which allows you to set the timing for lights to turn on/off or change colors; for example, I have 4 lights overhead in my bedroom and a 3 lights in a lamp in the corner, and I programmed them to slowly turn on one at a time over a 25 minute period when it is time for me to start waking up; My overhead lights turn on to be red, and the corner lamp turns on to be blue. As somebody who used to be a night owl but has adopted the new habit of waking up anywhere from 5 to 6 am, controlling the light levels and using them to help me wake up in the morning when it's still dark outside has been pivotal in helping me to make the change. At night my living room lights turn to red when it's time to start winding down and getting ready to feel tired.They are not natively set up to run with Siri commands (I don't have Alexa or Google Home) however you can set up various 'tap-to-run' automations and add a Siri shortcut to each of those, which may take a bit longer to set up for each individual function you want to make a shortcut for but once set up it is truly amazing to just say hey Siri, turn blue lights on or Hey Siri, turn all lights off; which you could obviously customize to be whatever phrase or command you want.TLDR; Overall I LOVE these lights and would definitely buy them again! Quality, Functionality, Automation, Timers and Seamless Integration throughout my house I give them an A++!

title: Great quality product!
reviewText: These are super easy to install and sync through Bluetooth. The colors are great! It’s nice that you can group them in the app (e.g., both hall lights and both stair lights), so that you can turn them on and off together as well as change the color to be the exact same. They are silent. No noise coming from them. The size was a perfect fit for a typical lightbulb. They seem like very good quality products, especially for the price! Love the you can also dim the lights. I get migraines but still need light to see where I am going, so that is very helpful. I’ve liked all my Govee products so far!

title: Sturdy, bright, and flexible color bulb
reviewText: Color choices are amazing, there are even themes that have the colors cycle through based on mood.The bulbs seem sturdy and the app is relatively easy to use. I found out the if using Google Home, if you long press on the bulb shortcut, then you can access some color changes directly from the Google Home app rather than needing to go to the Govee App. The one feature I'm still trying to figure out is how to really dim the lights to a low level, like before going to bed. My prior Sengled lights would dim to an acceptable low level, and these seem to still be too bright, even at a 5% brightness level.

title: Incredible light
reviewText: Los bombillos Govee son increíbles, la instalación es sencilla y se conectan rápido con la aplicación. Desde la app puedes controlar colores, intensidad y diferentes modos, lo que hace que el ambiente sea totalmente personalizable. Lo mejor es la función de sincronización con la música, las luces cambian al ritmo y crean un efecto espectacular, perfecto para relajarse o para una fiesta en casa. Una compra que vale totalmente la pena.

title: Replaced 4x porch lights, love being able to control with wifi
reviewText: Replaced 4x porch lights, love being able to control with wifi. Setup took less than 5 mins per bulb. Very easy! Nice to have the wifi feature going away, I can turn them on and off as it gets dark out so they don't need to stay on all weekend. Makes it look like someone is home for safety reasons. The color changing is nice for holidays as well.

title: Easy to connect!
reviewText: Thank you govee for making a bulb that is easy to connect to WiFi, google home and use. My mom has rheumatoid arthritis and the arms of a T. rex. We’ve used multiple different brands for her apartment but we will come back to these. We had Sengled bulbs simply disconnect and refuse to reconnect. We’ve had GE that won’t connect to WiFi. There have been times I’ve spent two hours and have still not been able to get lights to work and connect to google home. I need them to work and not take up all my time. You’ve solved my problem. I will be back!

title: Excellent lights
reviewText: Excellent lights, very crisp colors and they can get super bright. Make sure you have 2.4 GHz WiFi enabled for them as they won’t do 5 GHz. Set up is pretty easy through the app. Just turn off the light, take out the bulbs from the lamp or fixture you’re changing, place these ones in, power the light on. Then you use the app to set them up. You can name them as well and put them together as a group for a single room.There is some very slight delay when changing the light colors and levels, this is normal.

title: Very important for seniors, and those who have trouble walking in the dark
reviewText: Being elderly and living alone with medical problems, I do not have to walk in the dark from the living room to the bedroom. I can leave the lights on as I walk and turn them off when I get in bed. Great invention would not take anything for them.

title: Very easy to use!
reviewText: I really like  these lights a lot compared to the other brands I have tried from Amazon. The app is perfect, easy to use and the lights connect very easily.

title: Instant mood magic!
reviewText: These smart bulbs are amazing! Super easy to set up, tons of colors to choose from, and I love being able to control them from my phone or with Alexa. They instantly change the vibe of my room so much fun and really bright!

title: Works good with google home
reviewText: It was easy to set up the smart bulbs in the govee home app and it was easy to add them to Google home. The light bulbs are working very good.

title: Just buy it
reviewText: Just finished switching more than 20 sengled smart bulbs for govee. Govee costs only slightly more and is better in every way. No complaints about these bulbs so far. Look out for the deals.If you've got money to burn Philips Hue is typically better and only nominally meanwhile the price point is significantly higher.Definitely don't but anything cheaper than these or it will cost you more $ in the long run.I've been running Sengled and Ring bulbs for a decade. Now I'm strictly govee and philips hue.

title: Work Well; No Connection Issues.
reviewText: I've had a lot of problems with smart lightbulbs losing connection in the past, but these Govee ones are really consistent and do exactly what they're supposed to. I had to get the Govee app to get them to pair to Alexa, but beyond that, installation was very easy and getting the to sync from Govee to Alexa happened automatically and practically instantaneously.They look great and were affordable. I would buy these again. I've had them for over a year :)
